    entity.Constants.ShowingStatus
    getShowingStatus()
    Query the showing status of the movie Showing status is automatically derived from movie's releaseDate, endDate and the current LocalDate from the system clock Returns "END OF SHOWING" if current date is after movie end date Returns "NOW SHOWING" if current date is after release date and before end date Returns "PREVIEW" if current date is within 7 days before release date Returns "COMING SOON" if current date is more than 7 days before release date

    Calculates average review rating and updates reviewRating Overall reviewer rating will only be displayed if there are more than ONE individual rating, else NA is displayed Average review rating is set to -1 if there are no reviews currently available

  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie(int id, String title, String synopsis, String director, ArrayList<String> cast, ArrayList<String> genres, LocalDate releaseDate, LocalDate endDate, entity.Constants.ContentRating contentRating, entity.Constants.MovieType movieType)
      Parameters:
      id - for unique movie id
      title - for movie name
      synopsis - for a summary of the movie
      director - for the directors of the film
      cast - for the names of the people who have acted in the movie
      genres - for the type of genre portrayed by the film
      releaseDate - for when the film is going be released
      endDate - for when the film is going to end in the theatre
      contentRating - is whether the movie is PG, NC17 etc.
      movieType - for the type of movie it is

    • setAverageReviewRating

      public void setAverageReviewRating()
      Calculates average review rating and updates reviewRating Overall reviewer rating will only be displayed if there are more than ONE individual rating, else NA is displayed Average review rating is set to -1 if there are no reviews currently available

    • getShowingStatus

      public entity.Constants.ShowingStatus getShowingStatus()
      Query the showing status of the movie Showing status is automatically derived from movie's releaseDate, endDate and the current LocalDate from the system clock Returns "END OF SHOWING" if current date is after movie end date Returns "NOW SHOWING" if current date is after release date and before end date Returns "PREVIEW" if current date is within 7 days before release date Returns "COMING SOON" if current date is more than 7 days before release date
      Returns:
      Showing Status of the movie
